messages.message:
Brian
Now how many people in this group are actually going to participate?

Brian
Lets start the LAN parties!  For now through november we will be holding a LAN party every Sunday in Sechrist Room 115.  If we need to take advantage of other rooms or a classroom that may also be an option.  Let me know what you think!

Brian
I would like to hold the first clan meeting in my room Sechrist 115 this Sunday at 2:00. I would like to find out how much group participation we will have. At the meeting we will talk about what games people would like to play, and where people would like to meet. If you can't make it please stop by sometime during the day anyways. I hope to see many of you there!
